subject: Make Oral Presentation and Participate in the International Academic Conferences in May 2020 : Introducing: The Game Jam License
body:
Dear Professor, We learned you have published the paper *"Introducing: The Game Jam License"* in *Computers and Society*. Congratulations to you. To enhance the communication between authors and keep pace with the cutting-edge research, we sincerely invite specialists and scholars to attend the conferencess which to be held in in Hangzhou, China in May, 2020. Your paper will be published online in the cooperating journals once accepted. Original and unpublished papers are warmly welcomed to the conference. Abstracts are also welcomed to the conference. Authors are welcomed to present the abstracts in the conference. The conferences include topics like: Materials Science, Biochemical Engineering, Life Sciences, Social Sciences, Humanities, Finance, Computer Science, Data Science, Applied Mathematics, Natural Resources, Environment, Environmental Engineering, etc. Submitting your Full papers and abstracts to the conference The submission deadline is Feb. 10, 2020 Conferences Learn More Conferences: http://www.icsspp.com/enmore 2020 5th International Conference on Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Automation Topics: Power, Electrical Machinery and Appliance, Automated Manufacturing Systems, Telecommunications, Friction Stir Welding, Nanotechnology, Micro Electro-mechanical Systems, Computational Fluid Dynamics, Automated Waste Management, Computer Control, Continuous Control, Automated Video Surveillance, etc. 2020 5th International Conference on Civil and Environmental Engineering Topics: Geotechnical Engineering, Earthquake Engineering, Railway Engineering, Construction Surveying, Water Resources Engineering, Materials Science and Engineering, Environmental Technology, Air Pollution Control, Industrial Hygiene, Environmental Management, Waste Disposal, Environmental Engineering System, etc. 2020 5th International Conference on Education and Innovation Topics: Curriculum Studies, Early Childhood Education, Indigenous Education, Vocational Education, Life-long Education, Education for Sustainable Development, Innovation Culture, Innovative Research, Science and Technology Innovation, Educational Innovation, Financial Innovation, Commercial Innovation, etc. 2020 5th International Conference on Chemistry and Biochemical Engineering Topics: Atmospheric Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry, Agrochemistry , Chemical Engineering , Theoretical Chemistry, Physical Chemistry, Biological Hydrogen Production, General Biology, Photobioreactor, Bioinorganic Chemistry, Electrochemical Energy Conversion, Industrial Biotechnology, etc. 2020 5th International Conference on Public Health and Medical Sciences Topics: Insurance Medicine, Occupational Safety and Health, Health Services, Health Economics, Global Mental Health, Environmental Health, Pharmacology, Surgery, Internal Medicine, Immunology, Neurology, Diagnose, etc. Detailed abstract information of the previous published article (*Introducing: The Game Jam License*): Since their inception at the Indie Game Jam in 2002, a significant part of game jams has been knowledge sharing and showcasing ideas and work to peers. While various licensing mechanisms have been used for game jams throughout the years, there has never been a licence uniquely designed for artifacts created during a game jam. In this paper, we present to the community the Game Jam License (GJL) wh More


Dear Professor,
We learned you have published the paper "Introducing: The Game Jam License" in Computers and Society. Congratulations to you.
To enhance the communication between authors and keep pace with the cutting-edge research, we sincerely invite specialists and scholars to attend the conferencess which to be held in in Hangzhou, China in May, 2020. Your paper will be published online in the cooperating journals once accepted. Original and unpublished papers are warmly welcomed to the conference. Abstracts are also welcomed to the conference. Authors are welcomed to present the abstracts in the conference. The conferences include topics like: Materials Science, Biochemical Engineering, Life Sciences, Social Sciences, Humanities, Finance, Computer Science, Data Science, Applied Mathematics, Natural Resources, Environment, Environmental Engineering, etc.
Submitting your Full papers and abstracts to the conference
The submission deadline is Feb. 10, 2020
Conferences
Learn More Conferences: http://www.icsspp.com/enmore
 
    
2020 5th International Conference on Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Automation
Topics: Power, Electrical Machinery and Appliance, Automated Manufacturing Systems, Telecommunications, Friction Stir Welding, Nanotechnology, Micro Electro-mechanical Systems, Computational Fluid Dynamics, Automated Waste Management, Computer Control, Continuous Control, Automated Video Surveillance, etc.
 
    
2020 5th International Conference on Civil and Environmental Engineering
Topics: Geotechnical Engineering, Earthquake Engineering, Railway Engineering, Construction Surveying, Water Resources Engineering, Materials Science and Engineering, Environmental Technology, Air Pollution Control, Industrial Hygiene, Environmental Management, Waste Disposal, Environmental Engineering System, etc.
 
    
2020 5th International Conference on Education and Innovation
Topics: Curriculum Studies, Early Childhood Education, Indigenous Education, Vocational Education, Life-long Education, Education for Sustainable Development, Innovation Culture, Innovative Research, Science and Technology Innovation, Educational Innovation, Financial Innovation, Commercial Innovation, etc.
 
    
2020 5th International Conference on Chemistry and Biochemical Engineering
Topics: Atmospheric Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry, Agrochemistry , Chemical Engineering , Theoretical Chemistry, Physical Chemistry, Biological Hydrogen Production, General Biology, Photobioreactor, Bioinorganic Chemistry, Electrochemical Energy Conversion, Industrial Biotechnology, etc.
 
    
2020 5th International Conference on Public Health and Medical Sciences
Topics: Insurance Medicine, Occupational Safety and Health, Health Services, Health Economics, Global Mental Health, Environmental Health, Pharmacology, Surgery, Internal Medicine, Immunology, Neurology, Diagnose, etc.
Detailed abstract information of the previous published article (Introducing: The Game Jam License): Since their inception at the Indie Game Jam in 2002, a significant part of game jams has been knowledge sharing and showcasing ideas and work to peers. While various licensing mechanisms have been used for game jams throughout the years, there has never been a licence uniquely designed for artifacts created during a game jam. In this paper, we present to the community the Game Jam License (GJL) wh More
